description: This file defines a React functional component named StatCard, which renders a styled card displaying a label, a value, and optionally a trend indicator with an arrow and percentage. It is part of a frontend UI in a React-based project for an academic management system.

methods.name: StatCard({ label, value, trend })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a styled statistic card with label, value, and optional trend indicator.

ctags.name: StatCard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function StatCard({ label, value, trend }) {$/
